short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Capture your product easily, and build interactive product demos in AirDemo.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Effortlessly capture interactive HTML demos with a single click! This extension allows users to take HTML and visual screenshots of any webpage, tracking clicks and coordinates for detailed insights. Ideal for creating live, interactive demos, it features a toggleable capture mode and a streamlined, user-friendly interface. Perfect for developers, designers, and product teams looking to showcase and analyze webpage interactions.
